Activity: Review the assessment summary prepared yesterday. Refresh my memory on the proposed table extensions and code sets.

Refine the table specifications based on best practices for data normalization and performance. Consider indexing strategies to optimize query performance.
Review the proposed data model with @da-1, @da-2 to ensure it meets their reporting and analysis needs. Gather feedback and make necessary adjustments.
Update the database schema diagram and table specifications based on the feedback from @da-1, @da-2. Ensure all changes are documented.

Prepare a presentation summarizing the proposed database schema design, including the extended tables and new tables. Plan to present this to the IT Project Manager and Clinical Lead tomorrow for approval.
